entry.title: Evangaline Buckley Begins
entry.summary:
Author: Not_Ren_42

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,628Chapters: 17/24Kudos: 308

Summary: Evangaline Buckley has been alone for most of her life. She was unwanted by her parents and left by her sister when she had the first chance. For her most formative years, she had to go to extreme lengths just to get attention from those meant to care for her, failing more often than not.After finding out the truth about her creation, Evie decides that she has to do something ‚Äì anything. She goes through even more pain and heartbreak before finding herself where she was always meant to end up. -+- This is both a prologue and season 1 rewrite.New chapter every Friday :)

entry.title: just a little bit of your heart (is all I'm asking for)
entry.summary:
Author: dbolterstar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 344,119Chapters: 36/55Kudos: 372

Summary: ‚ÄúDoes this change a thing between us?‚Äù Buck asks, his voice low, hands still framing Eddie‚Äôs face. He can feel the unsteady breaths leaving Eddie‚Äôs lips, warm against his own. Eddie looks wrecked. His cheeks are flushed, lips red and kiss-swollen, his glassy eyes locked on Buck‚Äôs mouth like it‚Äôs the only thing he can see. He looks as hungry as Buck feels. Buck feels Eddie‚Äôs fingers trace along his arms, squeezing just enough to leave his skin tingling. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know.‚Äù It‚Äôs not a yes‚ÄîBuck‚Äôs not even sure he wants to hear a yes. But it‚Äôs so much better than the rejection Eddie threw at him before. ‚ÄúAlright,‚Äù Buck exhales, nodding like it‚Äôs nothing, even though it feels massive. Then he surges forward, catching Eddie‚Äôs mouth in his again. They don‚Äôt stop. Can‚Äôt. Their mouths are locked together like they‚Äôre trying to breathe each other in, like letting go for even a second would be unbearable.or; Eddie‚Äôs shame torments him. Buck would rather have a piece of Eddie than nothing at all. Miscommunication is their biggest enemy. Infidelity turns into their savior‚Ä¶ or ends up being the thing that destroys them?

entry.title: but if you're the one for me, then i'll be your hero
entry.summary:
Author: folklorestars

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,433Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 104

Summary: ‚ÄúLet me guess,‚Äù Eddie started, smiling faker than ever. ‚ÄúYou thought I'd be dying to ride in a car with Evan Buckley as he sings to one of his big hits. A fan's dream come true!‚Äù Eddie grinned ear to ear as cheesy as possible. Buck smiled awkwardly, so Eddie continued, ‚ÄúThere's just one problem.‚Äù ‚ÄúWhich is?‚Äù ‚ÄúI'm not your fan.‚Äù There was that wounded puppy look again. The sad eyes bigger and bluer than ever, mouth drooping down almost into a pout. ‚ÄúYou don't... You don't like my music?‚Äù ‚ÄúNo, I like your music. And I think you‚Äôre talented. I'm just not crazy about you like everyone else seems to be,‚Äù Eddie clarified. Or; the Buddie Starstruck AU

entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 726,934Chapters: 76/?Kudos: 104

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who‚Äôve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 502,956Chapters: 69/?Kudos: 29

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn‚Äôt end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they‚Äôre reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 295,825Chapters: 50/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn‚Äôt be more different. She‚Äôs the disciplined ‚Äúgood girl‚Äù with her future mapped out, while he‚Äôs the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Lead Me to the Light
entry.summary:
Author: purexheart

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,230Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 180

Summary: Buck knits his brows together. Hen and Chimney were right. He can‚Äôt remember the last time he‚Äôs needed to have the weight of Eddie‚Äôs hand pressing down on his shoulder to feel his calming influence cut through the hectic energy from an emergency call so that he could pinpoint the exact location of another person trapped in a fire. Or, when he no longer needed to hear Eddie‚Äôs voice to be able to quel the rage within him. Their bond has grown beyond that of a normal working sentinel and guide partnership.He glances up from the floor and looks towards Eddie. Eddie, who‚Äôs on the other side of the firehouse. Eddie, who‚Äôs already looking back at him, head tilting as a contemplative look passes over his features. Buck feels his heartbeat return to normal with just that glance, solidifying his thoughts.He was fucked.

entry.title: Better The Devil You Know, Than The Devil You Don't...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,636Chapters: 12/50Kudos: 420

Summary: Lucifer made a deal with the Buckley's, he will save Daniel and they take in and love his son Evan as their own. When the Buckley parents don't follow through with their side of the deal, Lucifer brings Evan with him to LA. This is the story of Evan Buckley the Son of the Devil, The Prince of Hell. Note:First 2 Chapters go through his life before the 118.Chapter 3 he is with the 118.Chapter 4 is when Eddie arrives. Author: CakeAnyoneAnyone28

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,437Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 9

Summary: Buck and Tommy have been steady ever since that kiss after the basketball game. It‚Äôs good. It‚Äôs easy. Tommy wants him in a way that feels safe. Buck tells himself that‚Äôs enough. He‚Äôs finally accepted that he likes men so dating Tommy makes sense, right? It‚Äôs real. It‚Äôs tangible. It isn‚Äôt the impossible thing he‚Äôs been carrying for years. Because Eddie is straight. Eddie is his best friend. And Buck knows better than to want something he can‚Äôt have. So he chooses Tommy. But what happens when the truth slips out in his sleep‚Ä¶ and the name on his lips isn‚Äôt Tommy‚Äôs?

entry.title: The sins we think we carry
entry.summary:
Author: Ilbu9k

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,246Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 6

Summary: The guilt of losing Bobby is a feeling all too well to the 118 completely, everyone has secrets and wrong doing's they have committed in the past but what happens when it all comes back to haunt them. Especially for Evan Buckley and Eddie Diaz, lost secrets admitted down to one person, one stranger who changed their lives forever. A call where the 118 are held hostage, forced to fess up their deepest darkest truth's, at what cost?Or The 118 are held hostage and have to confess to their sins. ~~ ‚ÄúYou know what, you know Edmundo.‚Äù Griffin whispers so close that Eddie can see every pore on his worthless face. ‚ÄúI love someone, more than I should.‚Äù He says making eye contact with Buck, Griffin laughs finally moving away from him, Eddie starts staring at the ground. ‚ÄúAnd I can‚Äôt tell them because then it‚Äôs real. Then I have to admit it to everyone and I know my parents disapprove.‚Äù Griffin smiles, turning to Buck. ‚ÄúGet up.‚Äù He yells and Eddie snaps his head up as Griffin presses the gun against the side of Buck‚Äôs head. Buck staring into Eddie‚Äôs eyes, frowning but the slightest glint in his eyes still appears, the happiness and joy that makes Buck, Buck. ‚ÄúTell him, Eddie. Tell him.‚Äù
